name: Evil FoodCards
description:
This is a dungeon crawler, where you build your deck to kill more food monsters!
Build your deck, and explore a cute world!

1) Every turn you play cards for your hand

2) Every card has a cost in mana (You have 3 mana per turn)

3) All of the card go to the discard pile at the end of your turn.

4) At the start of your turn you get 5 cards from your deck (If the deck is empty, your discard pile gets shuffled and becomes your deck)

5) Build the best deck and win the game!

Game by Alexey(programming) and Katie(art).
